title: I.Sicily inscription 004364
support: Thick plaque of off-white marble, intact on all sides except the right (which however does not affect the text which is complete). The reverse is finished smooth.

layout.p: Text is approximately centred on the stone, with a consistent left margin for lines 2-5, lines 1 and 6 centred.

handNote.lettering: Simply cut letters without notable serifs. Interpuncts are used but not consistently. Alpha has straight bar; epsilon is rectilinear with equal length bars; zeta is a plain Z; theta is rhomboid with detached cross-bar; kappa has slightly shortened arms; omicron is rhomboid; rho has closed round loop; sigma is rectilinear with horizontal bars; omega is rhomboid and open.

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, from Centuripe prior to 2 Feb 1907.

provenanceObserved._: Depositi, Magazzino B, cassa 4, Museo Archeologico Regionale Paolo Orsi

facsimile.desc: Photo J. Prag, 2014-09-11, by permission of Museo Archeologico Regionale Paolo Orsi

museum.name: Museo Archeologico Regionale Paolo Orsi
museum.description: An outstanding collection of archaeological material. The collection ranges from Siracusa and the surrounding territory (Megara Hyblaia, Akrai, Kasmenai etc) to encompass all of eastern Sicily, reaching as far as Gela and Agrigento. The ground floor covers prehistory through to the end of the Classical period. Upstairs includes Hellenistic and Roman Syracuse and a display of material from the catacombs. A gallery displaying material from Hellenistic eastern Sicily is in preparation.

bibl.author: Orsi
bibl.title: Notizie degli scavi di antichità
bibl.citation: Accademia nazionale dei Lincei, Istituto nazionale di archeologia e storia dell’arte (Italy), and Reale Accademia d’Italia, “Notizie degli scavi di antichità,” Notizie degli Scavi di Antichità, 1876, http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/1646037
